feature.label: Jess Reasoner
feature.description: This feature provides the functionalites to include Jess rule engine as a reasoner for the IVML variability modeling language. Note: this feature does not include the Reasoner itself due to licensing. Please download Jess manually.
feature.copyright: Copyright 2013 University of Hildesheim, Software Systems Engineering
